attr.title: Drift Survivor
attr.desc:
Paying Tribute to Classic Arcade Shooting Games. Drift Survivor is an addictive and fast-paced arcade shooting game that combines "drifting" with a "bullet hell" gameplay style!  
:Note: Use Start to resume the game from the pause menu!
attr.inst:
Instructions: Purchase the game from steam. Download the game. 
Place all the game files into ports/driftsurvivor/assets
attr.inst_md:
Instructions: Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2598080/Drift_Survivor/). Download the game. 
Place all the game files into ports/driftsurvivor/assets
